data.message:
Please, stop forcing the "Messenger" app on your costumers.

When you first started announcing the launch of this app, I ignored it. I enjoyed using the built-in messaging system rather than a whole separate app.
I've been following the app's reviews for months and you can clearly see your costumers aren't very pleased with how you're forcing this app on us... I've read far more negative reviews, than positive.

Today there was no way around the message regarding messenger. No matter how much I tried, I couldn't get around it.
This has resulted in me becoming extremely dissatisfied.

If this app remains mandatory, I'm quite certain I'll stop using Facebook.
Up until now, I've been using Facebook on a daily basis. I'm also a paying costumer.
Now I've ignored my messages on Facebook, and I've had people move over to other social medias to communicate with me.

Long story short: Make the "messenger" app OPTIONAL or you can sit back and watch your members leave.
